Desert Skirmish.name: Desert Skirmish
Desert Skirmish.flavor: You direct your allies to form a hasty skirmish line, foiling your enemiesâ€™ advance for a moment.
Desert Skirmish.target: You and one ally in the burst, or two allies in the burst
Desert Skirmish.effect: As a free action, the target can shift 2 squares and make a basic attack against an enemy of his or her choice. Until the start of your next turn, any enemy that willingly moves to a square adjacent to the target must stop moving.

Fighting Retreat.name: Fighting Retreat
Fighting Retreat.flavor: You make an attack to hobble an enemy, then direct your allies to fall back in a fighting retreat.
Fighting Retreat.onHit: 2[W] + ability modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends)
Fighting Retreat.effect: Either you and each ally within 5 squares of you can shift his or her speed as a free action, or you and one ally within 5 squares of you can shift 2 squares and make a basic attack against the target as a free action.

Merchant's Strategy.name: Merchant's Strategy
Merchant's Strategy.flavor: You do not allow others to set the terms of your defense, ensuring that you and your comrades are free to act as needed.
Merchant's Strategy.target: You and one ally in the burst
Merchant's Strategy.effect: If the target is marked, the marked condition ends. Until the end of your next turn, the target does not grant combat advantage.
